      static boolean processDirectory(Path inputDir, boolean enableOcr, List<NlpStage> nlpStages, List<NamedEntity.Category> nlpTargetEntities, List<NlpPipeline.Type> nlpPipelineTypes, int nlpPipelineParallelism, Indexer indexer, String index) 
      static boolean processDirectory(Path inputDir, FileParser.Type fileParserType, int fileParserParallelism, boolean fileParserDoOcr, List<NlpPipeline.Type> nlpPipelineTypes, int nlpPipelineParallelism, boolean nlpPipelineCaching, List<NlpStage> nlpStages, List<NamedEntity.Category> nlpTargetEntities, Indexer indexer, String index)
      Extract Documents from files in inputDir, Extract NamedEntitys from Documents, Store them into index Tasks coordination with local or shared in-memory BlockingQueues, - Scan files from inputDir, put on path queue - Parse each Path into a Document, poll from path queue and put on document queue - Index each Document to index using indexer - Extract all NamedEntitys from each Document using nlpPipelineTypes NlpPipelines - Index each NamedEntity to index using indexer

    • Method Detail

      • processDirectory

        public static boolean processDirectory(Path inputDir,
                                       FileParser.Type fileParserType,
                                       int fileParserParallelism,
                                       boolean fileParserDoOcr,
                                       List<NlpPipeline.Type> nlpPipelineTypes,
                                       int nlpPipelineParallelism,
                                       boolean nlpPipelineCaching,
                                       List<NlpStage> nlpStages,
                                       List<NamedEntity.Category> nlpTargetEntities,
                                       Indexer indexer,
                                       String index)
        Extract Documents from files in inputDir, Extract NamedEntitys from Documents, Store them into index Tasks coordination with local or shared in-memory BlockingQueues, - Scan files from inputDir, put on path queue - Parse each Path into a Document, poll from path queue and put on document queue - Index each Document to index using indexer - Extract all NamedEntitys from each Document using nlpPipelineTypes NlpPipelines - Index each NamedEntity to index using indexer
        Parameters:
        inputDir - the directory Path from which source files are scanned
        fileParserType - the FileParser.Type to instantiate
        fileParserDoOcr - the flag for activating OCR at file parsing time
        nlpPipelineTypes - the NlpPipeline.Types to be instantiated
        nlpPipelineParallelism - the number of threads per nlpPipelineType
        nlpPipelineCaching - the flag for caching models while running NlpPipelines
        nlpStages - the targeted NLP processing stage(s)
        nlpTargetEntities - the targeted named entity category(ies)
        indexer - the Indexer instance
        index - the destination index
        Returns:
        true if processings terminated successfully; false otherwise
